decks.notes: The focus of this deck is to control the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. The deck aims to slow down the opponent's game plan and disrupt their strategy while gradually gaining an advantage. It uses a mix of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw to maintain control of the game until it can win with powerful finishers like Jace, the Perfected Mind and Mirrex. The mana base is optimized for consistency and reliability, allowing the deck to consistently execute its game plan.

This deck focuses on using aggressive Mono Black creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It also includes graveyard manipulation and hand disruption to control the game. The deck includes powerful finishers like Archfiend of the Dross and Gix, Yawgmoth Praetor. Liliana of the Veil provides additional control and disruption. The deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain it throughout the game, utilizing the synergy between cards like Graveyard Trespasser and Mishra's Foundry. Overall, the deck aims to win through aggressive play and disruption.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly building up a board presence with low-cost creatures and using powerful combat tricks to overwhelm the opponent. The deck includes cards that buff and support the creatures, as well as removal spells to deal with threats from the opponent. The combination of efficient creatures and aggressive spells allows the deck to quickly apply pressure and close out games before the opponent can stabilize. The deck aims to be fast and aggressive, putting the opponent on the back foot from the very beginning.

This deck focuses on aggression with a mix of powerful creatures and versatile spells. It relies on controlling the board with removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down, while also maintaining card advantage and tempo with cards like Faerie Mastermind and Preacher of the Schism. The deck can quickly overwhelm opponents with its variety of threats like Deep-Cavern Bat and Raffine, Scheming Seer. The mana base is carefully constructed to support all the card colors and ensure consistent, strong plays throughout the game.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on using efficient creature and removal spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and control the battlefield. By utilizing creatures like Graveyard Trespasser and Hostile Investigator, alongside removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Additionally, cards like Duress and Liliana of the Veil help to further disrupt the opponent's hand and board state, giving the deck a strong advantage in the early and mid-game.

The deck focuses on aggressively building a board presence with efficient creatures like Hostile Investigator and Glissa Sunslayer, supported by removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down. It also utilizes disruptive cards like Duress to control the opponent's hand and Graveyard Trespasser to disrupt their graveyard. The mana base is optimized for consistent access to all colors needed for the deck's spells. Overall, the deck aims to pressure the opponent quickly and efficiently while disrupting their game plan.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying low-cost creatures and utilizing aggressive spells to overwhelm the opponent. The key strategy revolves around efficient creature deployment, utilizing cards like Imodane's Recruiter and Knight-Errant of Eos to build a formidable board presence. Resolute Reinforcements and Warleader's Call provide additional support for maintaining pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes removal spells like Gleeful Demolition to clear the way for attacks. Overall, this deck aims to establish early dominance on the battlefield and swiftly close out games with powerful creature attacks.

This deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent by utilizing aggressive creatures and burn spells. The key strategy is to play fast and hit hard, overwhelming the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. With a mix of low-cost creatures with haste and powerful burn spells, the deck aims to consistently apply pressure and finish off the opponent before they can mount a defense. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Urabrask's Forge and Monstrous Rage provide extra reach and damage potential to close out games quickly.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Duress, Cut Down, and Graveyard Trespasser, while putting pressure with efficient creatures like Caustic Bronco, Glissa Sunslayer, and Mosswood Dreadknight. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Aclazotz, Deepest Betrayal. The mana base is supported by cards like Llanowar Wastes and Blooming Marsh, allowing for consistent aggression. With a mix of removal, disruption, and threats, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly and decisively.
